++ Multiple Representations Of Files

MROF is where the same [Representations] have an automatic PointConsistency across [Files]. SFR aims to HelpTheUser in [Versioning] their files as different formats without forcing them to manually save (see NoManual) and update. 

++Implementation

[Users] often want the same file in multiple [Representations]. SFR means that a chance in one representation will reflect in a different representation of it. Slightly differing strategies to MROF include:
    * SingleFileRepresentation with AutomaticConversion OnTheFlyConversion
    * SynchronizedFileRepresentations


file equivalence grouping
 - represents various representations of a single file, eg the PDF file and the word processed document
 - or single file expands to multiple formats
 - could use the versions of imagery idea
